entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Musgrave Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:22 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pool's Island 09:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: S 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain or snow beginning this afternoon. Fog patches developing near noon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm except 5 cm north of Cape Freels. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along the coast overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along the coast early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
